Digital Has No Heart

December 2009

Information and Knowledge Economy is about the reason, the rational, the singularity toward moves is the digital brain.

People riding the knowledge wave are spending huge energies to create it — living on the bleeding edge of technology sacrifices almost all offline, real world presence.

Humans are pre-conditioned to think both with the mind and the soul, to sense both the rational and beyond, to use all available senses when gathering life experiences.

Digital life simplifies all these by dealing only with the mind.

During transition digital workers will loose their sense of reality, their capability to think with the heart, to realise the presence of the irrational in rational.

The new universe will be completely transparent in meanings of having no hidden dimensions, no need of other senses than the brain.

Irrational will be conditioned only by (the brain) capacity not by integrity, oneness and awareness.

Soon the heart won’t be needed anymore.

This story is about quantification. With focus on metasystem transition, transparency, integrity.
Communication
